basics.name: Finance Director
basics.label: Finance Professional
basics.summary: Dedicated and accomplished Finance Professional with extensive experience in FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT & BUDGETING seeks a management position where I can further enhance the achievement of an organization's objectives and targets.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reports directly to the Vice President of Finance and supports the CFO organization with financial and strategic insight.
highlights: Led the design and implementation of a more comprehensive incentive compensation plan that improved sales compensation effectiveness and minimized potential liability exposure to the company.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared and managed the annual budget, forecast and strategic long term plan process for the Concord & Paypoint divisions with revenue of $225M.
highlights: Administered and managed the National Sales compensation plans in a timely and efficient manner in order to accurately pay commissions totaling $4M annually.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and managed the annual budget and forecast process for the Cross Sales division with revenue of $57M.
highlights: Implemented process improvements including streamlining operations which positively impacted the bottom line by $1M.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared annual budget for the Medical Products division with revenue of $550M.
highlights: Recipient of numerous Q inside the O (Quality inside Olympus) awards.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared annual budgets for the Medical and Industrial Products divisions with combined revenue of $380M.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared annual budget with revenue of $55M.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared annual budget with revenue of $41M.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared annual expense budget totaling $6M for 47 Macy's Northeast stores.

keywords: Microsoft Office software (Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Access)
